DOC.brief_summary: This trial aims to evaluate if hyperbaric oxygen treatment (HBO) given postoperatively is effective in reducing healing time and wound complications after lower extremity bypass surgery in patients with diabetes. Hypothesis: Postoperative HBO treatment is effective in reducing complications in patients with diabetes undergoing peripheral vascular surgery
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatments to Reduce Complications in Diabetic Patients Undergoing Vascular Surgery

Simultaneous or previous (within 30 days prior to study entry participation in a clinical study using experimental drugs or devices.
